title: VA - What Becomes Of The Broken Hearted? (OST) (1999)@flac
description:
Soundtrack of the film from the book by Alan Duff; original score by David Hirschfelder; interspersed with original music written and performed by various musicians.
The Sequel to the Classic New Zealand Film 'Once Were Warriors'. 

 
http://i.imgur.com/CEF5IlK.jpg


01. David Hirschfelder - And So It Goes / Slippin' Away    [1:42]
02. Che Fu & DLT - Chains    [4:51]
03. Dam Native - The Horrified One    [3:32]
04. Unknown Artist - Tama Ngakua Marie (Funeral Scene)    [1:47]
05. Desmond Dekker - Shanty Town    [2:46]
06. David Hirschfelder - What Becomes    [5:12]
07. David Hirschfelder - Pig Hunt    [2:31]
08. Unknown Artist - E Ipo (Campfire Scene)    [1:26]
09. Che Fu - Waka    [3:42]
10. Renee Geyer - It Only Happens    [4:13]
11. Sina - Boy    [3:28]
12. Unknown Artist - He Puru Taitaima E (Jake's Party Scene)    [1:13]
13. Boo-Yaa T.R.I.B.E. - R.A.I.D.    [4:27]
14. DLT - Black Panthers    [3:42]
15. Supergroove - Sittin' Inside My Head    [3:30]
16. David Hirschfelder - Theme For The Broken Hearted    [3:02]



String Section: Filmharmonix 
Electric Violin: Nigel Maclean 
Cello: David Berlin 
Additional Strings: Attila Kuti, Stephen Freeman, Deirdre Dowling, Natalie Brown, Rupert Guenther 
Vocals: Susie Ahern, Janine Maunder, James Uluave, David Wilson 
Acoustic and Electric Guitar: Phil Buckle 
Orchestral Harp and Celtic Harp: Mary Doumany 
Piano, Prepard Piano, Electronic Instruments and Percussion: David Hirschfelder.


Original score by: David Hirschfelder 
Engineered and Mixed by: Chris Scallan
Mastered by: Michael Costa, Melbourne 

Recorded at Bedford Street Studios, Collingwood and Adephia Studios, Fitzroy, Australia.


Label: BMG Australia Ltd / RCA Victor
Released: 1999
Catalogue: 74321 68145 2

Codec: Flac
Compression Level: 6
Quality: High

Covers Included (600dpi)
